content.text: 遍历对象的所有可枚举自有属性，为每个属性执行回调函数。Iterates over all enumerable own properties of an object, executing a callback for each property
无返回值（函数用于副作用）。void (function is used for side effects)
当obj不是对象或fn不是函数时。When obj is not an object or fn is not a function
`Property ${key} has value ${val} in object with ${Object.keys(obj).length} properties`

summary.text: 要遍历的对象。Object to iterate over

text.comment: 要遍历的对象。Object to iterate over

summary.text: 为每个属性执行的回调函数（接收值、键和对象）。Callback function executed for each property (receives value, key, and object)

text.comment: 为每个属性执行的回调函数（接收值、键和对象）。Callback function executed for each property (receives value, key, and object)

Function:

forOwn

Description:

遍历对象的所有可枚举自有属性，为每个属性执行回调函数。Iterates over all enumerable own properties of an object, executing a callback for each property

Returns:

无返回值（函数用于副作用）。void (function is used for side effects)

Throws:

当obj不是对象或fn不是函数时。When obj is not an object or fn is not a function

Example:

// Basic iteration const obj = { a: 1, b: 2, c: 3 }; forOwn(obj, (val, key) => console.log(${key}: ${val})); // Output: "a: 1", "b: 2", "c: 3"

Example:
// Collecting values
const values = [];
forOwn({ x: 10, y: 20, z: 30 }, (val) => values.push(val));
console.log(values); // -> [10, 20, 30]
Example:
// Conditional processing
const result = {};
forOwn({ a: 1, b: 2, c: 3, d: 4 }, (val, key) => {
  if (val % 2 === 0) result[key] = val * 2;
});
console.log(result); // -> { b: 4, d: 8 }
Example:

// Using all parameters forOwn({ name: 'John', age: 30 }, (val, key, obj) => { console.log(Property ${key} has value ${val} in object with ${Object.keys(obj).length} properties); });

Example:

// Edge cases forOwn({}, (val) => console.log(val)); // No output (empty object) forOwn({ a: undefined, b: null }, (val, key) => console.log(${key}: ${val})); // -> "a: undefined", "b: null"
